result.reasoning: Base name 'vitals' commonly denotes vital signs measurements (e.g., HR, BP, RR, Temp). Suffix 'table' suggests a tabular dataset rather than a dictionary/reference, so it most likely contains measurement records (transactional). Vitals are typically a measurement-level entity (level 4) and often have companion metadata/dictionary files describing codes/units and possibly a dimension/master list of vital types.
